about_the_game:
This is the demo version of our dating simulation game, where you can experience a glimpse of the full dating adventure. The demo focuses on introducing the core mechanics and features of the game, giving you a taste of the digital love experience.

In this demo, you'll be able to:

  • Swipe Through Profiles: Swipe through a set of unique profiles and decide who you want to match with.

  • Chat and Connect: Engage in conversations with your matches and explore a some dialogue options to keep their interest.

  • Try the Gold Match Feature: Unlock and test the Gold Match feature, where you can type your own custom responses.

  • Experience Super Match: Mini-game to charm your way to love through the Super Match feature.

This demo offers approximately 20-30 minutes of gameplay and includes a small portion of the full game's content, allowing you to familiarize yourself with the game's mechanics and style. It's a preview of the features and fun the full version has to offer, but with limited scope and content.

name: Dating App Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Tired of getting ghosted IRL? Dating App Simulator is a fast-paced modern dating sim game where every match is a yes, every text gets answered, and falling in love is just a few grinding away—before they unmatch, of course. It’s love in the fast lane.
